articles.title: EU approves fifth jab as WHO urges greater effort to end pandemic - Medical Xpress
articles.description: The European Union approved its fifth Covid-19 vaccine Monday, stepping up its battle against the Omicron virus variant as the WHO called for greater efforts to ensure the pandemic ends next year.

articles.description: European nations implemented a wave of new restrictions as case numbers rise. And Israel added the U.S. and Canada to its "red list" of countries from which citizens are barred from travel.

articles.title: Omicron fears send Bursa, regional markets lower - The Star Online
